outputs.output_descr: Desarrollo de la capacidad nacional para el manejo y la eliminación de los polychlorinated biphenyl (PCBs) respetando el medio ambiente en Colombia.

project_descr:
Persistent Organic Pollutants
PPG Title: Development of national capacity for the environmentally sound management and disposal of PCBs.
project_title: Capacity For sound management and disposal of PCBs
